{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Smooth Rock |image = [[File:Smooth_Rock Updated.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Smooth Rock''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 2 {{Diamonds}} }} ==Description== The '''Smooth Rock''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Smooth Rock has a value of 2 [[Diamonds]] {{Diamonds}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Mine Layout== The Smooth Rock appears in the Underground as a 4x4 sized object.

[[File:SmoothRockMine 0-7-3.png|100px]] ==Acquisition== Smooth Rocks can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Weather Institute|Epic}} {{LootItem|Victory Road Kalos|Legendary}} |} |}
